caption.center: DAMON OWENS, Appellant, v. ST OF FL, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fifth District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Circuit Court for Orange County, Frederick J. Lauten, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
James B. Gibson, Public Defender, and Meghan Ann Collins, Assistant Public Defender, Daytona Beach, for Appellant.
Richard E. Doran, Attorney General, Tallahassee, and Allison Leigh Morris, Assistant Attorney General, Daytona Beach, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
COBB, PALMER and ORFINGER, R.B., JJ., concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL THE TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION, AND, IF FILED, DISPOSED OF.
